item.title: Flutter: Basic App Example | How to create a flutter app
item.description: Creating an App After installing flutter, you will be able to start making apps with Flutter. We will learn how to create a basic app with this tutorial. The app will have a simple button which will respond on click with the message “Hello Flutter”. From the Terminal Flutter provides a command-line tool that lets you start and manage your app. After installing Flutter you can start making apps with the following command.
